FILE: cm840850v11.0.txt
DYAD: INDONESIA-PHILIPPINES

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170521
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170521

MID4 2002-2010:

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4453

TERRMID: MID4453 3 -- not territorial
TERRMID-CER: MID4453 1 -- certain
TERRMID-NOTES: MID4453 settled border. 

TERRLINK: MID4453 3 -- not linked to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4453 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES:

MARITMID: MID4453 1 -- maritime
MARITMID-CER: MID4453 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: Fishermen arrested for illegal cross-border fishing. Maritime boundary is unsettled, at least through 2014/2016 (see also Asgeirdottier and Steinwand 2015). 

ISLMID: MID4453 3 -- not islands
ISLMID-CER: MID4453 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4453 3 -- not civil war
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4453 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4453 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4453 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES:

COUPMID: MID4453 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4453 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4453 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4453 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

rivalry=840850 nationa=INDONESIA nationb=PHILIPPINES MID4453 20030127-20030127 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

The Indonesian military sank four Philippine fishing boats and arrested the fishermen for illegally fishing in Indonesian waters. The Philippines protested the act. First day of dispute was on 1/27/2003 and last day of dispute was on 1/27/2003.
